name: Ernst Grafenberg
description:
Its location, a mystery to many. Its pursuit, a quest for some. Its discovery, a source of pleasure.

We're talking about the G-Spot, of course. Don't act so surprised!

And the man who discovered the G-Spot? Wait, that's not right. The man who first set his eyes upon... No. The man who explored the depths... Aha! The man who identified the area which came to be known as the G-Spot was Ernst Grafenberg, a German-born doctor.

So, why is it called the G-Spot? Well, it's actually short for the Grafenberg Spot. That's right, a woman's erogenous zone is named after a Jew with a handlebar mustache.

Think about that next time you try to... Oh, never mind.
